evidence_example.title: FIFO Message passing demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This is a simple demo that shows how to implement a set of FIFO Message passing primitives. Please refer to the FIFO Message Passing tutorial on the Evidence web site.
evidence_example.long_descr: This is a simple demo that shows how to implement a set of FIFO Message passing primitives. Please refer to the FIFO Message Passing tutorial on the Evidence web site.
